data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching (2015): Description of a new species and redescriptions of two rare species of Parapercis (Perciformes: Pinguipedidae) from the tropical Pacific Ocean. Zootaxa 3999 (2): 255-271, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3999.2.5
